body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Smith Maps               Science & Research       Smith's Maps Discover how John Smith made his map, the complexity and details it documents, as well as other maps that were drawn by explorers.    Indigenous Cultural Landscapes American Indians were not confined to the sites of houses, towns, or settlements. ICL's are evocative landscapes that capture the natural and cultural resources that supported American Indian lifeways and settlement patterns in the early 17th century.   NOAA Smart Buoys  Learn about the Smart Buoys that mark the trail and find out where to visit one.
